column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The hot tapas were infinitely better. Meatballs in sherry tomato sauce
column2: roasted dates with bacon in an apple vinagrette
column3: not QUITE on par with the bacon-dates at HB
column4: but probably a lot cheaper. Â The mushrooms stuffed with spinach and manchego cheese were alright as well. The mushrooms were nice and meaty
column5: not squishy or rotten at all.
